item.description: NATIONAL GRASSROOTS 3 STEPS TOWARD FREEDOM ACTIVISM FOR DR. RON PAUL December 7th to December 1Oth *EMAIL *CALL *CANVASS http://www.youtube.co... http://www.youtube.co... http://www.youtube.co... http://www.youtube.co... **EMAIL 300 - A SAMPLE EMAIL IS LOCATED AT WWW.3STEPSTOWARDFREEDOM.COM FOR YOU TO SEND OUT ON THE MORNING OF DECEMBER 7TH TO ALL OF YOUR CONTACTS. TRY TO REACH 300. ANOTHER SAMPLE EMAIL WILL BE POSTED SOON TO BE SENT OUT TO ALL OF YOUR CONTACTS THE EVENING OF THE 10TH, please stay tuned for updates. **CALL 300 - AT WWW.3STEPSTOWARDFREEDOM.COM YOU WILL FIND THE INFORMATION TO VOLUNTEER FOR THE PHONE FROM HOME PROGRAM. SOME OF YOU ARE LUCKY ENOUGH TO HAVE A CAMPAIGN OFFICE VERY CLOSE TO YOU THAT IS SET UP FOR CALLING, ONCE YOU VOLUNTEER YOU MAY RECEIVE INFORMATION REGARDING THE LOCATION. TRY TO CALL 300. **CANVASS 300- AT WWW.3STEPSTOWARDFREEDOM.COM YOU WILL FIND THE LINK TO ORDER SLIM-JIMS, AS WELL AS SUPER-BROCHURES FOR SUPER VOTERS. YOU WILL ALSO FIND INFORMTAION ON HOW TO PURCHASE A PRECINCT FOR THE FIRST FEW CAUCUS STATES. YOU CAN CHOOSE TO PLEDGE AT WWW.RONPAULFLYERBOMBS.COM. TRY TO CANVASS TO 300, YOU CAN PURCHASE A PRECINCT AT WWW.RONPAULPRODUCTS.COM
